lenders.name: Meredith Dellandrea
lenders.loan_because: I think micro-lending works!  It connects me to people around the world and makes me feel like, together, with small steps, we can make the global economic system more equitable.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for CBC Radio, Canada's public broadcaster.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: it allows people in poverty to transform their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an emergency medicine physician hoping to work in the global health field.

lenders.name: Davenport, Iowa
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to support such hard-working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I garden, knit, and study at college.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I feel that a small loan can create a huge opportunity for someone willing to work hard to better their life as well as the lives of their family.

lenders.name: Carl and Gail
lenders.loan_because: I want to...
lenders.occupational_info:
Car mechanic, I work with my hands.
Ceramic potter, I make bowls with my hands.  "We are the people who make things."

lenders.name: Sandy and Blake
lenders.loan_because: I heard about Kiva on PBS and thought it is a great way to get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I work with truant students  and their families.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want people to feel they can support themselves.  No one wants to be beholden forever to another person.  Loaning helps someone become self-suffiicient and also lets them know that someone cares about them.
lenders.occupational_info: I sew for other people.  I make \"Home Dec\" items (i.e., duvets, roman shades, pillows, cushions, etc.).

lenders.name: Senjen
lenders.loan_because: microcredit for productive use should be available for every person who warrants it.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this program and I believe responsible lending can be a powerful tool in helping people achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if a person is able to help another person, they should. Helping others is the most noble thing a person can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I take students on trips to places that  teach them how amazing the world is!

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: When I looked up what the CEO of the charity I had given to was making I was appalled.I knew there was a better way to make sure that those in need had the oppertunity to \"help them selves.\"  I heard about Kiva on NPR.In my life I have had the help of others and I belive in \"passs it on\"
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from 41 years of nursing

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupation: This loan comes from our whole family
lenders.loan_because: We are sending this loan in celebration of the winter holidays.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers. My mother, Christine is a doctor and my father, Brock is a businessman. My brother, Scott is a musician and my sister, Jean Marie is an anthropologist. My other sister, Lareissa just got married and is studying to be a doctor as well.

lenders.name: Julie and David
lenders.loan_because: We have our own small business and have been growing it for the past five years. We want to help support others in the world to accomplish their dreams, too.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be part of an enterprise that is building lives and contributing to our world.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: \"Cash is King\" and to help those who make a real difference in the world!
lenders.occupational_info: As founder of InfinitiWireless, a 10 year old company that services telecomuication companies throught the world. We provide repair of microwave radio transmission equipment use by Goverment,Utilities,Schools,Emergency services.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to be a woman who is in the position to help other women.

lenders.name: Ken & Tyler
lenders.loan_because: To share some of my very good fortune.  Hopefully provide an example for my children and grandchildren by supporting young entrepreneurs through Kiva.  Also supporting young children via programs like Plan Canada in areas like Central America, Thailand, Nepal, Philippines.
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying activities in retirement - photography, golf, my bicycle, travel and trying to learn Spanish.... again

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it does someone else, somewhere else, some good. It\'s Christmas eve here and I saw that this person needed $150 (USD) more. So I loaned it.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a Business student at the local Community College. I also have a degree from the University, in the field of Computer Science.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important to give people an opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: it's an antidote to poverty, to disenfranchisement, to low self-worth...
lenders.occupational_info: I work with nonprofits, foundations, citizen groups, social entrepreneurs and thinkers at the intersection of progressive issues, media, arts and culture, business and big ideas. I use communications and PR to help shape a more sustainable, healthy and just world, promoting people and the planet above profit.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: My brothers & sisters around the world are exactly equal to me in every way possible except I have a little more money, so I will try to even up the situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I make films about those in need in hopes those who are OK will help. I have a masters in Visual Anthropology and have made documentary films for 30 years.

lenders.name: Quinton
lenders.loan_because: We might still be able to make this a better world if we help each other when we can.

lenders.name: John and Marie
lenders.loan_because: We think this is a great idea and we hope to help any way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Marie is an amazing, talented, warm and compassionate student who will someday be great. John hopes to reach people with his music.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Every one deserves a chance to create a business that will one day help many more people than just the owner of the business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that are serious about changing their lifestyle for the better. I do one-on-one coaching over the internet or in person.

lenders.name: Syd
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way for even the poorest residents of the \"First/developed\" world to transfer some of our relative economic advantage - our affluence - to our counterparts across the economic divide.
lenders.occupational_info: In edition to editing a small quarterly, I primarily use my communications skills to advocate for animal rights and welfare, ethical eating and agriculture and a better global order.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I work with obstetricians and gynecologists to reduce the chances of adverse outcomes that may lead to lawsuits.

lenders.name: Maylia
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into a privilaged country and I realize I could have wound up in the same positions any of these people are in. I want to share what I have.

lenders.name: Elin,Bjørn
lenders.loan_because: people need help

lenders.name: Tom Emily Kate & Anna
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I can directly impact peoples lives that really need help
lenders.occupational_info: Investor, real estate development

lenders.name: Anil
lenders.loan_because: I understand that right help at the right time can make a huge difference in the lives of people.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring together people from different specialities to build highly usable software.

lenders.name: Blue Smoke Coffee
lenders.loan_because: I started Blue Smoke as a way to give back to the world, while pursuing my passion of roasting great coffee.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm the owner/roaster of a small eco-friendly coffee roasting business.  I hand-roast organic, fair trade, shade grown beans using green renewable energy and donate at least 5% of sales to environmental and humanitarian causes.

Blue Smoke Coffee Roasting Co.
Coffee with a Soul

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a small way for me to have a big impact in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company designs customized business training solutions for our clients.

lenders.name: Tracy & Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and gratifying to assist others in realizing their dreams.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: This allow us to take an active interest in helping to build better lives.  This is not charity.  This is a real start for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help solve problems between organizations and get rid of the obstacles that keep people from doing their job.

lenders.name: Louie
lenders.loan_because: My wise old uncle gave Kiva accounts for Christmas. I've got to think that the group of philosophers known as Jesus would appreciate that!

lenders.name: Roy & JoLynn
lenders.loan_because: Because my daughter asked us to donate for her christmas-channukah present .

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone can achieve their goals with a little bit of help. Creating self sufficiency benefits everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have developmental disabilites find and maintain employment

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to see other people follow their dreams.

lenders.name: Barry & Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: We are constantly inspired by the heart, creativity and resourcefulness of the all the loan recipients.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it's the ultimate model to help people while keeping their dignity.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: This is very interesting and I think it is a wonderful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young children with autism.

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.occupation: doctor of psychology, volunteer emerg responder
lenders.loan_because: i believe in positive and interactive communities--and this is one really good way to add value to the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: help people in crisis and study clinical problems to be a part of the improvement of science and interventions in mental health care.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think that microfinance is a great way for the more fortunate people in the world to help those that are not as lucky by giving them an opportunity to improve their lives through running their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired I helped other Canadians plan how to accumulate some savings that would  help them in their retirement.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: EVERYONE needs help once in awhile to gain independence or remain independent. Being independent gives freedom to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young people 12-18 years old stop using drugs and alcohol, become independent, and learn to help others.

lenders.name: Gioia and Onno
lenders.loan_because: Business is something that interests me and if I ever started my own, I also would appreciate help

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because the need is great

lenders.name: Rick and Judy
lenders.loan_because: This is a valuable way to assist those who are working for themselves. And the great thing is you can keep doing it over and over again with the same money!
lenders.occupational_info: Rick was a reseach scientist investigating the effects of space on satellites and communication systems and developing ways to predict when the effects might occur - for example, solar flares and geomagnetic storms. Judy is a retired graphic artist who runs a non-profit animal rescue organization.

lenders.name: Patty and Wyatt
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.  We are all in this together.  A bank will loan people in the U.S. money for some of the craziest business ideas imaginable, and see the success it has bred.  It makes sense that people with great business ideas in other countries should have access to credit also, no matter how small.
lenders.occupational_info: Patty is a lawyer and an entrepeneur.  She used to work in a courtroom, now she works on her own business projects.  Wyatt is a City Manager.  Elected officials appoint him to make sure the city operates well.  This includes making sure: the trash is picked up, taxes are collected, streets are safe and citizens are happy.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being able to

lenders.name: Constance
lenders.loan_because: I like to help out hardworking people-in-need and because my granddaughter and grandson-in-law are founders.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from being an executive secretary.  I look after my 2 daughters and 4 grandchildren and take daily care of my African Parrot, Jamie.

lenders.name: Keara Haldeman
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: To share the resources God has entrusted to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the world a smaller place.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.loan_because: because I help people in need by doing something I enjoy

lenders.name: Ka-Ping Yee
lenders.occupational_info: Most of the United States now votes in elections using electronic voting machines.  I work to make these machines more trustworthy, fair, and accessible.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the benefits of micro finance and enjoy having a direct roll in the distribution of my funds.  I studied the micro finance model in school and know how effective it can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I make environmental documentaries with a special focus on fly fishing and the need to protect pristine watersheds.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the gifts and would like to pass along fellowship and kindness to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Human Resources and Communications Advisor for an International Glass Company.

lenders.name: Andrea & Brian
lenders.loan_because: it's fun to see what people across the world are doing and to support them in their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: Andrea studies economic issues that impact women.  Brian does development and research on small heaters and circuitboards.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance projects are one of the best hopes of alleviating poverty.  They offer opportunities that not only enhance the lives of the people who receive loans, but the benefits extend to their families and the local area in which they live.  I was very excited to find out about Kiva, as it gives me a chance to be more closely involved in a process that can truly change lives.

lenders.name: Linda & Paul
lenders.loan_because: It\\\'s the right thing to do. Those who have should share with those who don\\\'t.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can, so I should.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: there are so many people of the world that can have a better life with just a bit of help.

lenders.loan_because: 10% Payback in 180 Days\r\nComputer reital Business 3000 SQFT\r\nTry Lone Server
lenders.occupational_info: SELL SELL SELL

lenders.loan_because: I can help empower people who have the desire  to improve their situation through perseverance, hard work and creativity.

lenders.name: Ted & Julie
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the integrity of the human spirit independent of their religious, social or economic position.

lenders.name: Sally or Herb

lenders.occupational_info:
retired fine artist (painting) (Herb)
 retired secretary (Sally)

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I can. Through microlending, I'm making a difference to the lives of those excluded from the traditional financial system through contributing to their ability to help themselves and their families to achieve a better quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others to help themselves to improve their social and economic well-being.

lenders.name: robert
lenders.loan_because: to help create world abundance
lenders.occupational_info: I hope to inspire a sense of wonder and joy through art.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because:
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful people can change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
~Margaret Mead

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to live a better life and enjoy living their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work across the United States with organizations that serve youth everyday afterschool and during the summer .

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: <marquee>I think it\'s important for others who work hard to get something great out of it</marquee>

lenders.name: Tom & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to be part of the tide of benign globalization.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in business. I believe in women. And owning a business gives women power.
lenders.occupational_info: I build brands. Creating new products that you use in your everyday life.

lenders.name: D,L,S,H&G
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the dreams of each person and how important our individual efforts can be
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer and my husband is an attorney in the technology area

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will help.
lenders.occupational_info: Driving services for individuals and groups of up to 6.

lenders.name: Vergil
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computer problems at a community college.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I work for a non-profit, Choice Humanitarian whose efforts also support micro enterprise and busineses throughout the world.  I would like to focus on Mexico, Central, and South America.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in Kenya, Nepal, Vietnam, Guatemala, Bolivia, and Mexico in rural development and helping by supporting the communities.  We have in country dedicated staff in these countries working all year identifying projects and communities that are in need of our assistance.

lenders.name: holly
lenders.loan_because: $25 is a drop in the bucket over a lifetime, but that money can go so much farther and contribute to such a bigger, better cause when it's needed.  Being able to make that kind of impact is important and a responsibility that everyone should take charge of and foster.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals who have various disabilities and chronic illnesses.  Through work, I am able to help advocate for individuals on a large or small scale - whether it be through educating their families, speaking on behalf of them at their school, teaching them what employments options are available to them, helping navigate disability law and federal funding, or simply supporting them when they need someone to talk to.  We do a lot for so many individuals in our region, and I am glad to be a part of it.

lenders.name: Sharru
lenders.loan_because: I've been through some tough times with my family, but I don't really remember struggling for food or shelter. I really want to help people who need it, even though I don't fully understand what they're going through right now.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the ability to make their lives all they want it to be.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major canadian bank helping people make financial transactions, manage their money, save and invest

lenders.name: Anika
lenders.loan_because: Because some people are really poor and need the extra help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in second grade.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It\'s Christmas and I feel like donating to a worthy cause that I\'ve discovered thru my son.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and live in Logan, Utah

lenders.name: Yi-Jeng
lenders.loan_because: I believe there are individuals who can succeed in life despite the situations they were born with.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure the drugs produced at our company is up and beyond the standards set by the Canadian Government.

lenders.name: Tom and Ann
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate to be able to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Tom is a retired college professor and Ann worked in libraries.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I believe what Mother Teresa said: None of us can do anything great on our own, but we can all do a small thing with great love. I hope that this small thing will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with doctors writing for medical publications that are used primarily to train new physicians and to enhance the quality of health care provided to patients around the world.

lenders.name: Dennis and Alex
lenders.loan_because: we are able to and the world needs a little kindness where-ever and whenever it can get it.

lenders.name: Caitlin G.
lenders.occupation: secret agent (oops! forget I said that)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Recently, we lost Don Thomson, a loving spouse to Julie and father to his 5 children (Ron, Rick, Randy, Marney, David) and 3 step-children (Derek, Wade, Tracy). We wanted to make this donation as a tribute to his generosity.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the concepts of personal responsibility
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of peoples skin diseases and assit in running Health care systems

lenders.name: joop and kitty
lenders.loan_because: I have experienced many  difficulties and roadblocks associated with starting up a business

lenders.name: Lowell

lenders.name: Tom

lenders.name: Fernando
lenders.loan_because: It is good for everyone

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it\'s the least I can do to help out the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large manufactures recycle their waste wood rather than land filling it.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others and do as much as I can to help the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: I have and they don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and operate computer networks.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: We really can change the world...one person at a time!

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: Microloans improve peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep computers and networks running at a medium-sized business.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I have so much, and it takes so little to help others.  With Kiva, my original gift can be given again and again.  What an amazing concept!  Watching people rising out of poverty; to be a small part of this is such a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I give people tools and teach them how to use them.  In particular, I teach them about the power of their thoughts.

lenders.name: Tiina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who dare to dream of a better life which is built on their own hard work.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of any better way I have heard to help those who need help and are willing to become more self-sufficient.  I am blessed and want to share with others and hope they will be blessed and share as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children--age 11 and 12 years old.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I live by The Golden Rule--treat others as you would like to be treated.

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: i like the idea of ordinary people helping each other

lenders.loan_because: it makes sense

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.occupational_info: Me is used in many constructions where strict grammarians prescribe I. This usage is not so much ungrammatical as indicative of the shrinking range of the nominative form: me began to replace I sometime around the 16th century largely because of the pressure of word order. I is now chiefly used as the subject of an immediately following verb. Me occurs in every other position: absolutely, emphatically, and after prepositions, conjunctions, and verbs, including be. Almost all usage books recognize the legitimacy of me in these positions, especially in speech; some recommend I in formal and especially written contexts after be and after as and than when the first term of the comparison is the subject of a verb.

lenders.loan_because:
Instead of buying traditional presents that people often may not want or need, I prefer to put the money to good use and buy them Kiva gift certificates. 

After their loan is paid back, they can then choose whether to withdraw the cash or keep on loaning (which is surprisingly addictive I've found).
